feature.label: Import Them
feature.description: Import a bunch of projects. Goovy is used to specify the imports. You have to install Extra Groovy commpilers/Groovy Commpiler 2.0 Feature Groovy-Eclipse/Groovy-Eclipse Feature Uncategorized/JDT Core patch for Groovy-Eclipse plugin
